relationships.description: Discussing aircraft management and depreciation strategies

analysis.purpose: To discuss aircraft management options and tax depreciation strategies for aircraft under new tax rules
analysis.significance: Shows business discussions about aircraft management and tax optimization strategies following proposed Trump administration tax changes

notable_quotes: new depreciation rules proposed under trump
We think we cannot use accelerated due to foreign travel preponderance, and obviously can't use bonus because not new

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - purely business discussion about aircraft management and tax strategies

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a legitimate business discussion about aircraft management and tax depreciation strategies

public_knowledge.context: Technical discussion about aircraft management and tax depreciation strategies, unlikely to be of broad public interest

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Barry J. Cohen and Jeffrey Epstein discussing aircraft management options between Jet Aviation and EJM, along with tax depreciation strategies for aircraft under proposed Trump administration tax rules, including considerations about foreign travel and straight-line depreciation.
